thread.title: Will Eva Mendes Join Ryan Gosling at the Oscars?
thread.title_full: Will Eva Mendes Join Ryan Gosling at the Oscars?

author: Just Jared
title: Will Eva Mendes Join Ryan Gosling at the Oscars?
text:
Ryan Gosling is still figuring out who he will be bringing with him to the upcoming Oscars.
While arriving at the Santa Barbara International Film Festival last night, the 36-year-old actor played coy when asked if longtime love Eva Mendes will join him at the Oscars.
CHECK OUT: Ryan Gosling Thanks Eva Mendes , Dedicates Golden Globe Win to Her Late Brother 
“Oh, I’m not sure,” Ryan said. “It’s still a little while away.”
Ryan is nominated for Best Actor for his role in the hit film La La Land .
While being interviewed, Ryan also shared that Eva came up with one of the most memorable lines from the film.
“‘LA worships everything and values nothing.’ That was something my lady said to me one day and I thought it was so funny I asked her if I could put it in the movie,” Ryan said. “She was kidding, but it’s a funny thing to say… I loved when she said it, because it’s funny enough to have some truth to it, you know? But it’s obviously a joke, so it just seemed appropriate for the movie.” 
Ryan and Eva have been together since 2011 and have two daughters together – two-year-old Esmeralda and nine-month-old Amada .
